mapper.sql:
where status != '-1'
and ( qx like '%${keyword}%' or qymc like '%${keyword}%' or jydz like '%${keyword}%' or fr like '%${keyword}%' or lxdh like '%${keyword}%')
and qx like '%${qx}%'
and qymc like '%${qymc}%'
and jydz like '%${jydz}%'
and fr like '%${fr}%'
and lxdh like '%${lxdh}%'
and status = #{status}
mapper.select: select id,qx,qymc,jydz,fr,lxdh,bz,addTime,status from dz_syjyqy where status != '-1' order by id desc
select id,qx,qymc,jydz,fr,lxdh,bz,addTime,status from dz_syjyqy order by ${orderby} limit #{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id,qx,qymc,jydz,fr,lxdh,bz,addTime,status from dz_syjyqy where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into dz_syjyqy( id, qx, qymc, jydz, fr, lxdh, bz, addTime, status ) values( #{id}, #{qx}, #{qymc}, #{jydz}, #{fr}, #{lxdh}, #{bz}, #{addTime}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update dz_syjyqy set qx=#{qx}, qymc=#{qymc}, jydz=#{jydz}, fr=#{fr}, lxdh=#{lxdh}, bz=#{bz}, addTime=#{addTime}, status=#{status} where id=#{id}
update dz_syjyqy set status = #{status} where id in (${ids})
update dz_syjyqy set status = '-1' where id in (${ids})
